Description.AUTO_PARTY_TRACKING: Automatic tracking of Pokémon in your party
Description.AUTO_PARTY_TRACKING_FIELD_LEVEL_MET: Automatic party tracking - Level at which the Pokémon was caught
Description.AUTO_PARTY_TRACKING_FIELD_TYPES: Automatic party tracking - Detecting the Pokémon types from the ROM instead of a generic Pokédex
Description.AUTO_PARTY_TRACKING_FIELD_HIDDEN_POWER: Automatic party tracking - Pokémon hidden power
Description.AUTO_PARTY_TRACKING_FIELD_POKERUS: Automatic party tracking - If a Pokémon has Pokérus - the Pokémon virus
Description.AUTO_PARTY_TRACKING_FIELD_NICKNAME_SPECI: Automatic party tracking - Non-standard (non-alphanumeric) characters in a Pokémon nickname
Description.AUTO_PARTY_TRACKING_FIELD_MET_AS_EGG: Automatic party tracking - Detecting what location a Pokémon was met, when hatched from an egg
Description.AUTO_PARTY_TRACKING_FIELD_POKEBALL: Automatic party tracking - The Pokéball used to catch a Pokémon
Description.AUTO_PARTY_TRACKING_FIELD_IS_GIFT: Automatic party tracking - Whether the Pokémon was a recieved as a gift
Description.AUTO_PARTY_TRACKING_FIELD_EVS: Automatic party tracking - Pokémon Effort Values
Description.AUTO_PARTY_TRACKING_FIELD_IVS: Automatic party tracking - Pokémon Individual Values
Description.AUTO_PARTY_TRACKING_FIELD_EGG_CYCLES: Automatic party tracking - Pokémon remaining egg cycles
Description.AUTO_PARTY_ROUTE_TRACKING: Automatic party tracking - Automatic Route tracking for Pokémon in the party
Description.AUTO_BOX_ROUTE_TRACKING: Automatic Route tracking - Pokémon sent directly to your box will have their routes tracked
Description.AUTO_BATTLE_TRACKING_FIELD_ACTIVE_IN_BAT: Automatic updates during battle - Detecting what Pokémon is currently in battle
Description.AUTO_BATTLE_TRACKING_FIELD_STATUS_EFFECT: Automatic updates during battle - Pokémon status effect
Description.AUTO_BATTLE_TRACKING_FIELD_HP: Automatic updates during battle - Pokémon HP
Description.MANUAL_BADGE_TRACKING: Manual tracking of badges using the badges screen within Pokélink
Description.MANUAL_PARTY_TRACKING: Manual updating of your party using the Party Pokémon screen within Pokélink
